activities.name: get last modified date from product table

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(modifieddate) as lastmodifieddate from saleslt.product

dependsOn.activity: get last modified date from product table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from saleslt.product where modifieddate>'@{activity('get_date_from_hw_file').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' 
    and modifieddate <= '@{activity('get last modified date from product table').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate}'

activities.name: update the high water file with lastmodifieddate

sqlReaderQuery.value: select '@{activity('get last modified date from product table').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select A.firstname||isnull(''||middlename||'','')||lastname as CustomerName,B.* FROM [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] B join [SalesLT].[Customer] A
on b.customerid=a.customerid;
select count(*) as recordcount from saleslt.address

activities.name: get the data from hwm table

dependsOn.activity: get the data from hwm table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select max(modifieddate) as lastmodifieddate from saleslt.customer

select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate>'@{activity('get the data from hwm table').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' 
    and modifieddate <= '@{activity('get the lastmodifieddate from table').output.firstRow.lastmodifieddate}'
select count(*) as CustomerCount from saleslt.customer
